name: Mashrafe Mortaza
description: Experienced fast bowler and former captain known for his leadership on the field.
tagline: Leader on the Field, Master of Pace.

name: Shakib Al Hasan
description: Versatile all-rounder with a brilliant cricketing mind. Master of spin and a dependable middle-order batsman.

name: Mushfiqur Rahim
description: The heart of the team and a skilled wicket-keeper. A consistent batsman known for his composure under pressure.
tagline: Heart of the Team, Composure Under Pressure.

name: Tamim Iqbal
description: Explosive left-handed opener with a wealth of experience. Holds numerous records in Bangladesh cricket.

name: Mustafizur Rahman
description: Young pace sensation with deadly variations. The 'Fizz' can trouble any batsman with his yorkers and cutters.

name: Mehidy Hasan Miraz
description: Talented off-spinner known for his accuracy and breakthroughs. A future star in Bangladesh's spin department.

name: Liton Das
description: Elegant right-handed opener with a penchant for explosive strokes. A vital cog in Bangladesh's top order.

name: Taskin Ahmed
description: Express fast bowler known for raw pace and toe-crushing yorkers. A match-winner with the ball.

name: Soumya Sarkar
description: Hard-hitting left-handed batsman and handy medium-pacer. Adds balance with both bat and ball.

name: Mahmudullah Riyad
description: Experienced all-rounder, cool under pressure, and a reliable finisher. A senior figure in the team.

name: Nasum Ahmed
description: Young left-arm spinner with a bag of tricks. His variations make him a potent force in T20 cricket.

name: Abu Hider Rony
description: Pacy fast bowler with the ability to generate bounce. A genuine wicket-taker in the early overs.

name: Aminul Islam Biplob
description: Young leg-spin sensation with a knack for deceiving batsmen. Rising star in Bangladesh's spin department.

name: Najmul Hossain Shanto
description: Stylish left-handed batsman with a solid technique. Promising talent in the middle order.

name: Taijul Islam
description: Left-arm orthodox spinner known for his accuracy. Can trouble batsmen with his subtle variations.

name: Mominul Haque
description: Solid left-handed batsman with a penchant for building innings. A key figure in the test format.

name: Rubel Hossain
description: Experienced fast bowler with raw pace and ability to reverse swing. A match-winner in ODIs.

name: Anamul Haque
description: Stylish right-handed batsman with a penchant for big scores. An asset in limited-overs cricket.

name: Mosaddek Hossain
description: Versatile all-rounder known for his big-hitting prowess and handy off-spin. A game-changer in T20s.

name: Imrul Kayes
description: Experienced top-order batsman with a knack for building partnerships. A reliable presence in ODIs.

name: Sabbir Rahman
description: Aggressive right-handed batsman known for his attacking style. A match-winner in T20 cricket.

name: Mohammad Saifuddin
description: A talented all-rounder known for his ability to hit big shots and contribute with the ball. A rising star.

name: Shoriful Islam
description: Young left-arm pacer with great potential. Can generate good pace and swing.
tagline: Young Left-arm Pacer, Pace and Swing Specialist.

name: Afif Hossain
description: Young all-rounder with a bright future. Can contribute with bat and ball in various formats.

name: Mohammad Mithun
description: Solid middle-order batsman who can keep wickets when needed.

name: Arafat Sunny
description: Experienced left-arm spinner who can provide crucial breakthroughs.

name: Ebadot Hossain
description: Right-arm fast bowler with good control and the ability to move the ball off the pitch.
tagline: Right-arm Fast Bowler, Ball Movement Specialist.

name: Tanzid Hasan Tamim
description: Young and promising opening batsman with a solid technique.

name: Nayeem Hasan
description: Off-spin bowler with the ability to extract turn and bounce from the pitch.
tagline: Off-spin Maestro, Turn and Bounce Specialist.

name: Towhid Hridoy
description: Young and talented middle-order batsman with a bright future.
tagline: Talented Middle-order Batsman, Bright Future Ahead.

name: Nazmul Islam Apu
description: Left-arm spinner known for his ability to contain runs in the shortest format.
tagline: Left-arm Spin Specialist, Run Containment Expert.

name: Tajul Islam
description: Left-arm orthodox spinner who can provide crucial breakthroughs.

name: Shuvagata Hom
description: Experienced all-rounder who can contribute with bat and ball.
tagline: Experienced All-rounder, Bat and Ball Contributor.

name: Abul Hasan Raju
description: Experienced all-rounder who can provide valuable contributions with bat and ball.

name: Yasir Ali Chowdhury
description: Promising young batsman known for his aggressive strokeplay.

description: Wicket-keeper batsman known for his ability to play aggressive strokes.

description: Young left-arm spinner with a bag of tricks. His variations make him a potent force in T20 cricket.
